verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%> and Timotheus, <S%G5095><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are at <S%G1722><s%> Philippi, <S%G5375><s%> with the bishops <S%G1985><s%> and deacons: <S%G1249><s%>
Grace <S%G5485><s%> be to you, and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father, <S%G3962><s%> and from the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
I thank <S%G2168><s%> my God <S%G2316><s%> on every <S%G3956><s%> remembrance <S%G3417><s%> of you,
Always <S%G3842><s%> in every <S%G3956><s%> prayer <S%G1162><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> for you all <S%G3956><s%> making <S%G4160><s%> request <S%G1162><s%> with joy, <S%G5479><s%>
For your <S%G5216><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> in the gospel <S%G2098><s%> from the first <S%G4413><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> until <S%G891><s%> now; <S%G3568><s%>

Being confident <S%G3982><s%> of this <S%G5124><s%> very <S%G846><s%> thing, that he which has begun <S%G1728><s%> a good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> in you will perform <S%G2005><s%> it until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

Even <S%G2531><s%> as it is meet <S%G1342><s%> for me to think <S%G5426><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> of you all, <S%G3956><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> you in my heart; <S%G2588><s%> inasmuch <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> as both <S%G5037><s%> in my bonds, <S%G1199><s%> and in the defense <S%G627><s%> and confirmation <S%G951><s%> of the gospel, <S%G2098><s%> you all <S%G3956><s%> are partakers <S%G4791><s%> of my grace. <S%G5485><s%>

For God <S%G2316><s%> is my record, <S%G3144><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> greatly <S%G1971><s%> I long <S%G1971><s%> after <S%G1971><s%> you all <S%G3956><s%> in the bowels <S%G4698><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And this <S%G5124><s%> I pray, <S%G4336><s%> that your <S%G5216><s%> love <S%G26><s%> may abound <S%G4052><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> and more <S%G3123><s%> in knowledge <S%G1922><s%> and in all <S%G3956><s%> judgment; <S%G144><s%>

That you may approve <S%G1381><s%> things that are excellent; <S%G1308><s%> that you may be sincere <S%G1506><s%> and without <S%G677><s%> offense <S%G677><s%> till <S%G1519><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Being filled <S%G4137><s%> with the fruits <S%G2590><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> to the glory <S%G1391><s%> and praise <S%G1868><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But I would you should understand, <S%G1097><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> that the things which happened to me have fallen <S%G2064><s%> out rather <S%G3123><s%> to the furtherance <S%G4297><s%> of the gospel; <S%G2098><s%>
So <S%G5620><s%> that my bonds <S%G1199><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> are manifest <S%G5318><s%> in all <S%G3650><s%> the palace, <S%G4232><s%> and in all <S%G3956><s%> other <S%G3062><s%> places;

And many <S%G4119><s%> of the brothers <S%G80><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> waxing <S%G3982><s%> confident <S%G3982><s%> by my bonds, <S%G1199><s%> are much <S%G4056><s%> more <S%G4056><s%> bold <S%G5111><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> without <S%G870><s%> fear. <S%G870><s%>

Some <S%G5100><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> of envy <S%G5355><s%> and strife; <S%G2054><s%> and some <S%G5100><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of good <S%G2107><s%> will: <S%G2107><s%>

The one <S%G3303><s%> preach <S%G2605><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> of contention, <S%G2052><s%> not sincerely, <S%G55><s%> supposing <S%G3633><s%> to add <S%G2018><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%> to my bonds: <S%G1199><s%>
But the other of love, <S%G26><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that I am set <S%G2749><s%> for the defense <S%G627><s%> of the gospel. <S%G2098><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> then? <S%G1063><s%> notwithstanding, <S%G4133><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> way, <S%G5158><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> in pretense, <S%G4392><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> in truth, <S%G226><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is preached; <S%G2605><s%> and I therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> do rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> yes, <S%G235><s%> and will rejoice. <S%G5463><s%>

For I know <S%G1492><s%> that this <S%G5124><s%> shall turn <S%G576><s%> to my salvation <S%G4991><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> prayer, <S%G1162><s%> and the supply <S%G2024><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

According <S%G2596><s%> to my earnest <S%G603><s%> expectation <S%G603><s%> and my hope, <S%G1680><s%> that in nothing <S%G3762><s%> I shall be ashamed, <S%G153><s%> but that with all <S%G3956><s%> boldness, <S%G3954><s%> as always, <S%G3842><s%> so now <S%G3568><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> shall be magnified <S%G3170><s%> in my body, <S%G4983><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> it be by life, <S%G2222><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> by death. <S%G2288><s%>
For to me to live <S%G2198><s%> is Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and to die <S%G599><s%> is gain. <S%G2771><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> I live <S%G2198><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of my labor: <S%G2041><s%> yet <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> I shall choose <S%G138><s%> I know <S%G1107><s%> not.

For I am in a strait <S%G4912><s%> between <S%G1537><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a desire <S%G1939><s%> to depart, <S%G360><s%> and to be with Christ; <S%G5547><s%> which is far <S%G4183><s%> <S%G3123><s%> better: <S%G2909><s%>
Nevertheless <S%G1161><s%> to abide <S%G1961><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is more <S%G316><s%> needful <S%G316><s%> for you.

And having this <S%G5124><s%> confidence, <S%G3982><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> that I shall abide <S%G3306><s%> and continue <S%G4839><s%> with you all <S%G3956><s%> for your <S%G5216><s%> furtherance <S%G4297><s%> and joy <S%G5479><s%> of faith; <S%G4102><s%>
That your <S%G5216><s%> rejoicing <S%G2745><s%> may be more abundant <S%G4052><s%> in Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> for me by my coming <S%G3952><s%> to you again. <S%G3825><s%>

Only <S%G3440><s%> let your conversation <S%G4176><s%> be as it becomes <S%G516><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ: <S%G5547><s%> that whether <S%G1535><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> and see <S%G1492><s%> you, or <S%G1535><s%> else be absent, <S%G548><s%> I may hear <S%G191><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> affairs, <S%G4012><s%> that you stand <S%G4739><s%> fast in one <S%G1520><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> with one <S%G3391><s%> mind <S%G5590><s%> striving <S%G4866><s%> together <S%G4866><s%> for the faith <S%G4102><s%> of the gospel; <S%G2098><s%>

And in nothing <S%G3367><s%> terrified <S%G4426><s%> by your <S%G3588><s%> adversaries: <S%G480><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is to them an evident <S%G1732><s%> token <S%G1732><s%> of perdition, <S%G684><s%> but to you of salvation, <S%G4991><s%> and that of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For to you it is given <S%G5483><s%> in the behalf <S%G5228><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> not only <S%G3440><s%> to believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him, but also <S%G2532><s%> to suffer <S%G3958><s%> for his sake;
Having <S%G2192><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> conflict <S%G73><s%> which <S%G3634><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> in me, and now <S%G3568><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> to be in me.
